PAST_WORKS.name: Rabbi Moshe Zalman
PAST_WORKS.tweet:
Happy Purim, @TheEylon!
Just as Esther used her influence to protect her people, we too can leverage our voices in the crypto space for good.

PAST_WORKS.name: Rabbi Moshe Zalman
PAST_WORKS.tweet: As Rabbi Nachman of Breslov taught, 'If you believe you can do it, you can do it.' Faith in oneself and one's abilities is crucial for success, whether on the soccer field or in life. Let's apply this wisdom ...
